requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: i3-10100 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR on Meta with Meta Quest 2
  • Additional Notes: This is a VR only game and a VR headset is required!
